import React,{useState} from 'react' function AddUser() { let navigate = useNavigate(); const [contact, setContact] = useState({ name: "", address: "", phone: "", email: "", dateOfBirth: "", password: "", }); const { name, address, phone, email, dateOfBirth } = contact; const inputchanges = (e) => { setContact({ ...contact, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }); }; const submitForm = async (e) => { e.preventDefault(); await axios.post("http://localhost:8080/contacts/new", contact); navigate("/home"); }; return (
